name: Displaced - Demo Project
description:
This is a demo project of Displaced. 

Displaced is an adult, mildly comedic fantasy themed management and TRPG game with crafting. You play as Arron, an exiled prince who becomes a leader of a small village in a distant lands. Fight monsters, complete quests and gather resources to produce strong and unique gear.

  • Visual novel style storytelling
  • Turn based combat
  • Extensive crafting system and management
  • Settlement changes visually with upgrades

Currently you can support this project indirectly with patreon, or check out our previous game https://strive4power.itch.io/strive-for-power. Please leave a feedback on the forums as this will greatly influence the future of this project. 

A gigantic thanks to the supporting patrons who allowed us to make this game into existence.
